verses.text: \w Then|strong="H6213"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w fled|strong="H1272"\w* \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w Naioth|strong="H5121"\w* \w in|strong="H6213"\w* \w Ramah|strong="H7414"\w*. \w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w came|strong="H1732"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w Jonathan|strong="H3083"\w* \w and|strong="H1732"\w* \w asked|strong="H4100"\w*, “\w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w have|strong="H5771"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w*? \w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w is|strong="H4100"\w* \w my|strong="H1732"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w*? \w How|strong="H4100"\w* \w have|strong="H5771"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w sinned|strong="H2403"\w* \w against|strong="H6440"\w* \w your|strong="H6440"\w* father, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* wants \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w take|strong="H6213"\w* \w my|strong="H1732"\w* \w life|strong="H5315"\w*?”

“\w Far|strong="H2486"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w it|strong="H6213"\w*!” Jonathan replied. “\w You|strong="H6213"\w* \w will|strong="H1697"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*. \w Indeed|strong="H2009"\w*, \w my|strong="H5641"\w* father \w does|strong="H6213"\w* \w nothing|strong="H3808"\w*, \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w small|strong="H6996"\w*, \w without|strong="H3808"\w* telling \w me|strong="H4480"\w*. \w So|strong="H6213"\w* \w why|strong="H4069"\w* \w would|strong="H1697"\w* \w he|strong="H6213"\w* \w hide|strong="H5641"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w matter|strong="H1697"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w me|strong="H4480"\w*? \w This|strong="H2088"\w* \w cannot|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H4191"\w* true!”

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w again|strong="H5750"\w* \w vowed|strong="H7650"\w*, “\w Your|strong="H3068"\w* father \w knows|strong="H3045"\w* \w very|strong="H3045"\w* \w well|strong="H5869"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w favor|strong="H2580"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* said, ‘\w Jonathan|strong="H3083"\w* \w must|strong="H5315"\w* \w not|strong="H3045"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w*, \w or|strong="H6435"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H5750"\w* \w grieved|strong="H6087"\w*.’ \w As|strong="H5315"\w* \w surely|strong="H3588"\w* \w as|strong="H5315"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w lives|strong="H5315"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w as|strong="H5315"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w yourself|strong="H5315"\w* \w live|strong="H2416"\w*, \w there|strong="H4672"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w step|strong="H6587"\w* \w between|strong="H3045"\w* \w me|strong="H5315"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w death|strong="H4194"\w*.”

\w Then|strong="H6213"\w* \w Jonathan|strong="H3083"\w* said \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, “\w Whatever|strong="H4100"\w* \w you|strong="H6213"\w* \w desire|strong="H5315"\w*, \w I|strong="H5315"\w* \w will|strong="H5315"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w for|strong="H6213"\w* \w you|strong="H6213"\w*.”

\w So|strong="H7971"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* told \w him|strong="H7971"\w*, “\w Look|strong="H2009"\w*, \w tomorrow|strong="H4279"\w* \w is|strong="H2009"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w New|strong="H2320"\w* \w Moon|strong="H2320"\w*, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w I|strong="H5704"\w* am supposed \w to|strong="H5704"\w* dine \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*. \w Instead|strong="H2009"\w*, \w let|strong="H7971"\w* \w me|strong="H7971"\w* \w go|strong="H7971"\w* \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w hide|strong="H5641"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w field|strong="H7704"\w* \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w third|strong="H7992"\w* \w evening|strong="H6153"\w* \w from|strong="H7971"\w* \w now|strong="H2009"\w*.

\w If|strong="H3588"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* father \w misses|strong="H6485"\w* \w me|strong="H4480"\w* \w at|strong="H1732"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w*, \w tell|strong="H3605"\w* \w him|strong="H3605"\w*, ‘\w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w urgently|strong="H7592"\w* \w requested|strong="H7592"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* permission \w to|strong="H3117"\w* hurry \w to|strong="H3117"\w* \w Bethlehem|strong="H1035"\w*, \w his|strong="H3605"\w* hometown, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w is|strong="H3117"\w* \w an|strong="H8033"\w* annual \w sacrifice|strong="H2077"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w whole|strong="H3605"\w* \w clan|strong="H4940"\w*.’

\w If|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w says|strong="H3541"\w*, ‘\w Good|strong="H2896"\w*,’ \w then|strong="H3588"\w* \w your|strong="H3045"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w is|strong="H2896"\w* \w safe|strong="H7965"\w*, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w if|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H2896"\w* enraged, \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H5650"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w has|strong="H5650"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* intentions.

\w Therefore|strong="H5921"\w* \w show|strong="H6213"\w* \w kindness|strong="H2617"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3426"\w* \w brought|strong="H6213"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w into|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w before|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*. \w If|strong="H3588"\w* \w there|strong="H3426"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, \w then|strong="H2088"\w* \w kill|strong="H4191"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w yourself|strong="H6213"\w*; \w why|strong="H4100"\w* \w should|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w bring|strong="H6213"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* father?”

“\w Never|strong="H3808"\w*!” \w Jonathan|strong="H3083"\w* replied. “\w If|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w ever|strong="H3808"\w* \w found|strong="H3045"\w* \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* father \w had|strong="H3588"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* intentions \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, \w would|strong="H7451"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w tell|strong="H5046"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*?”

\w Then|strong="H6030"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w asked|strong="H4100"\w* \w Jonathan|strong="H3083"\w*, “\w Who|strong="H4310"\w* \w will|strong="H4310"\w* \w tell|strong="H5046"\w* \w me|strong="H5046"\w* if \w your|strong="H5046"\w* father \w answers|strong="H6030"\w* \w you|strong="H5046"\w* \w harshly|strong="H7186"\w*?”

“\w Come|strong="H3318"\w*,” \w he|strong="H1732"\w* replied, “\w let|strong="H3212"\w* \w us|strong="H7704"\w* \w go|strong="H3212"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* \w field|strong="H7704"\w*.” \w So|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w of|strong="H7704"\w* \w them|strong="H3318"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w into|strong="H3212"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* \w field|strong="H7704"\w*,

\w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w Jonathan|strong="H3083"\w* said, “\w By|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w sound|strong="H2896"\w* \w out|strong="H7971"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* father \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w this|strong="H3588"\w* \w time|strong="H6256"\w* \w tomorrow|strong="H4279"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w next|strong="H7971"\w* \w day|strong="H6256"\w*. \w If|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w favorable|strong="H2896"\w* \w toward|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w send|strong="H7971"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* tell \w you|strong="H3588"\w*?

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w if|strong="H3588"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* father \w intends|strong="H3190"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w bring|strong="H6213"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, \w then|strong="H1961"\w* \w may|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w punish|strong="H6213"\w* \w me|strong="H7971"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* ever \w so|strong="H6213"\w* severely, \w if|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w not|strong="H6213"\w* tell \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w send|strong="H7971"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w way|strong="H3541"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w safety|strong="H7965"\w*. \w May|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, \w just|strong="H6213"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w been|strong="H1961"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* father.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w as|strong="H6213"\w* \w long|strong="H5750"\w* \w as|strong="H6213"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w live|strong="H2416"\w*, \w treat|strong="H6213"\w* \w me|strong="H5978"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*’s loving \w devotion|strong="H2617"\w*, \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w may|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*,

\w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w do|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w ever|strong="H5769"\w* \w cut|strong="H3772"\w* \w off|strong="H3772"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* loving \w devotion|strong="H2617"\w* \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w household|strong="H1004"\w*—\w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w even|strong="H5704"\w* \w when|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w cuts|strong="H3772"\w* \w off|strong="H3772"\w* \w every|strong="H3068"\w* \w one|strong="H3808"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*’s enemies \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* earth.”

\w So|strong="H3027"\w* \w Jonathan|strong="H3083"\w* \w made|strong="H3772"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* covenant \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, saying, “\w May|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w hold|strong="H1004"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*’s \w enemies|strong="H3027"\w* accountable.”

\w And|strong="H1732"\w* \w Jonathan|strong="H3083"\w* \w had|strong="H1732"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* reaffirm \w his|strong="H1732"\w* \w vow|strong="H7650"\w* out \w of|strong="H5315"\w* love \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w him|strong="H1732"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w Jonathan|strong="H3083"\w* loved \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w as|strong="H5315"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* loved \w himself|strong="H5315"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H3588"\w* \w Jonathan|strong="H3083"\w* said \w to|strong="H2320"\w* David, “\w Tomorrow|strong="H4279"\w* \w is|strong="H2320"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w New|strong="H2320"\w* \w Moon|strong="H2320"\w*, \w and|strong="H3083"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3588"\w* \w be|strong="H2320"\w* \w missed|strong="H6485"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w your|strong="H3588"\w* \w seat|strong="H4186"\w* \w will|strong="H3588"\w* \w be|strong="H2320"\w* \w empty|strong="H6485"\w*.

\w When|strong="H3117"\w* \w you|strong="H3117"\w* \w have|strong="H3117"\w* \w stayed|strong="H3427"\w* \w three|strong="H8027"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*, hurry \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w* \w you|strong="H3117"\w* \w hid|strong="H5641"\w* \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w this|strong="H3117"\w* trouble began, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w remain|strong="H3427"\w* beside \w the|strong="H3117"\w* stone Ezel.

\w I|strong="H7971"\w* \w will|strong="H7971"\w* \w shoot|strong="H3384"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w arrows|strong="H2678"\w* \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H7971"\w* \w side|strong="H6654"\w* \w of|strong="H3384"\w* \w it|strong="H7971"\w*, as if \w I|strong="H7971"\w* \w were|strong="H7969"\w* aiming \w at|strong="H7969"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w target|strong="H4307"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H2009"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w send|strong="H7971"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w boy|strong="H5288"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w say|strong="H1697"\w*, ‘\w Go|strong="H3212"\w*, \w find|strong="H4672"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w arrows|strong="H2678"\w*!’ \w Now|strong="H2009"\w*, \w if|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* expressly \w say|strong="H1697"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w him|strong="H7971"\w*, ‘\w Look|strong="H2009"\w*, \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w arrows|strong="H2678"\w* \w are|strong="H1697"\w* \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w this|strong="H1697"\w* \w side|strong="H2008"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*; \w bring|strong="H3947"\w* \w them|strong="H7971"\w*,’ \w then|strong="H2009"\w* \w come|strong="H3212"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w as|strong="H1697"\w* \w surely|strong="H3588"\w* \w as|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w lives|strong="H2416"\w*, \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w safe|strong="H7965"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w there|strong="H2009"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w no|strong="H4480"\w* danger.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w if|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* say \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w young|strong="H7971"\w* \w man|strong="H5958"\w*, ‘\w Look|strong="H2009"\w*, \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w arrows|strong="H2678"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w beyond|strong="H4480"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*,’ \w then|strong="H2009"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* must \w go|strong="H3212"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w away|strong="H7971"\w*.

\w So|strong="H1961"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w hid|strong="H5641"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w field|strong="H7704"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w when|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w New|strong="H2320"\w* \w Moon|strong="H2320"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w come|strong="H1961"\w*, \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w sat|strong="H3427"\w* \w down|strong="H3427"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w eat|strong="H3899"\w*.
